name: Gem Stalker
languages: telepathy 60 ft. understands Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The gem stalker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The gem stalker doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The gem stalker makes four Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.
